DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine local treatment effective treatment toenail fungus ( distal subungual onychomycosis ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate TMI-358 Treatment Distal Subungual Onychomycosis
DOC.criteria: Male female , 18 75 year age , inclusive Diagnosed distal subungual onychomycosis ( DSO ) toenail Great toe ( ) intact skin intact neurologic function Great toenail ( ) free nail polish At least one target great toe : 25 75 % involvement area nail unit ( include destroy miss part nail plate ) least 2 mm uninvolved nail growth measure proximal nail fold proximal point disease process lunular involvement nail unit hyperkeratosis distal edge measure great 3 mm positive KOH culture Any significant disease hepatic , renal , endocrine ( include diabetes mellitus ) , immune system , health condition could interfere confound result study assessment Preexisting chronic foot pain , neurologic deficit skin disease/injury treat foot In case female subject , pregnant , nursing , plan become pregnant within study period History clinically significant abnormal laboratory value , include liver function test result equal great 2 x upper limit normal Diseaselike psoriatic toenail , significant toenail abnormalities/dystrophies , toenail injury condition toenail could interfere study evaluation ( e.g. , prevent obtain normal appear nail , clear onychomycosis , due chemical damage , genetic pigmentary disorder , etc . ) Have white superficial onychomycosis , proximal subungual onychomycosis , yellow spike , dermatophytoma Have paronychia Have history chronic alcohol drug abuse
